mil3.3.12:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasinghatake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato purisam agacchantam, passeyya dakkhinadisato purisam agacchantam, passeyya pacchimadisato purisam agacchantam, passeyya uttaradisato purisam agacchantam;
mil3.3.12:2.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yanca puriso cakkhuna rupam passati, tam vinnanena vijanati.
mil3.3.12:2.4: Yanca sotena saddam sunati, tam vinnanena vijanati.
mil3.3.12:2.5: Yanca ghanena gandham ghayati, tam vinnanena vijanati.
mil3.3.12:2.6: Yanca jivhaya rasam sayati, tam vinnanena vijanati.
mil3.3.12:2.7: Yanca kayena photthabbam phusati, tam vinnanena vijanati, yanca manasa dhammam vijanati, tam vinnanena vijanati.
